author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA RE-FORMS TO THE NORTHEAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA...
summary: ...MELISSA RE-FORMS TO THE NORTHEAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA... As of 5:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -73.5 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
